description: A comprehensive iOS Swift application template demonstrating advanced Salesforce Mobile SDK integration using MobileSync data framework. This template provides a full-featured contact management app with offline sync capabilities, search functionality, and a modern SwiftUI interface with split-view navigation.
useCase: Use this template when you need to create a production-ready iOS app with full Salesforce data synchronization capabilities. It's ideal for developers building apps that require offline functionality, complex data relationships, and professional-grade user interfaces.

customizationPoints.description: Customize the app name, package name, and organization details
instructions: Update template.js with new app name, package name, and organization
Modify package.json with new app name
Update Xcode project files with new identifiers
Update entitlements file with new package name

customizationPoints.description: Add new Salesforce objects beyond the default Contact
instructions: Create new SObject data classes following the ContactSObjectData pattern
Add new objects to the SObjects.swift registry
Create corresponding UI components for new objects

customizationPoints.description: Extend the SwiftUI interface with additional components
instructions: Add new SwiftUI views for additional functionality
Add new toolbar items and actions
Modify sync up/down logic in ViewModels
Add custom sync targets and configurations

customizationPoints.description: Customize the widget extension for recent contacts
